---
category: news
title: "A step towards quantum gravity"
excerpt: "In Einstein's theory of general relativity, gravity arises when a massive object distorts the fabric of spacetime the way a ball sinks into a piece of stretched cloth. Solving Einstein's equations by using quantities that apply across all space and time coordinates could enable physicists to eventually find their \"white whale\": a quantum theory of gravity."
